snippet: Third Point sent Yahoo a request for records relating to its selecting Scott Thompson, a former eBay executive, as its chief executive, after the besieged technology company admitted that it had misstated its leader's academic credentials.
abstract: Third Point sent Yahoo a request for records relating to its selecting Scott Thompson, a former eBay executive, as its chief executive, after the besieged technology company admitted that it had misstated its leader's academic credentials.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Third Point Demands Records From Yahoo's C.E.O. Search
